basics.name: Amit Kumar Saha
basics.label: Aspiring Entrepreneur, Enterprise Architect, Technology & Infomation Security Consultant
basics.summary: More than a decade and a half of experience in leadership, architecture, design, development, migration and support of large-scale, distributed, scalable, enterprise software systems

education.institution: West Bengal University of Technology, India

highlights: Designing and developing Ericsson Intelligent Automation platform for Network Management
Implementing Cloud Native Arcitecture and Contract Driven Development approach to develop Open APIs
Working on creating a platform to enable internal and 3rd party developers to develop and manage lifecycle of apps
Bridged the gap between business and technology by converting business requirements to technical specifications and solutions for technical team
Converted organizational goals into deliverables by engaging various stakeholders leading to increased efficiency, communication and transparency
Contributed towards team building and the professional development of peers by mentoring
Ensured consistency in architecture and implementation, by evaluating and adopting best practices, tools and technologies for solution

Built resiliency and scalability of the systems by designing and implementing OAuth2 based Identity and Access Management, Distributed Cache, Event Sourcing, Digital Document Execution with e-Signature, API Integration, Data encryption using AES and Digital signature among many others
Drastically improved code quality and reusability by optimizing solutions, reviewing implementations, mentoring and leading a team of engineers for the development and support of software systems
Planed, designed, documented and coordinated the development and integration of systems
Minimized boilerplate code by migrating the project from Spring 1.x to Spring Boot 2.x
Reduced integration and build time by more than 70% by migrating to modern build tools and DevOps
Designed and developed new features and changes
Worked on data structure of existing and new proprietor tools and frameworks for implementing changes
Implemented Electronic Health Record (EHR) and HL7 processing, Meaningful Use-I, Meaningful Use-II and Medical Necessity engine for Cerner Soarian Financials

awards.title: Star Award
awards.summary: State Bank Global IT Centre Excellence Award (Star Award) is awarded to the employees of State Bank of India who have delivered excellence while performing their role or duty during that period
